[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@sym20/core-conversations](./core-conversations.md) &gt; [IConversationStore](./core-conversations.iconversationstore.md) &gt; [getConversation](./core-conversations.iconversationstore.getconversation.md)

## IConversationStore.getConversation() method

Get a conversation

Only conversations that are public, or that the acting user is a member of, are available. So even if the specified conversation ID actually exists, this method will fail with [ConversationNotFound](./core-conversations.conversationnotfound.md) if the conversation is not available to the acting user.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getConversation(conversationId: ConversationId): Promise<IConversation>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  conversationId | <code>ConversationId</code> | The conversation to get |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Promise<IConversation>`

A single conversation

## Exceptions

ConversationNotFound [ConversationNotFound](./core-conversations.conversationnotfound.md)
